short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to display only the YouTube search bar and limit results to 3 videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension helps to make youtube time less. Purpose is to limit search results and once you play any video then showing no suggestion box on the right side so that you are not distracted. 

You might need to refresh after toggling, if sometimes changes on UI are not visible instantly.

Step 1: Install the Plugin. (Nothing happens to your youtube page at this moment)
Step 2: Enable the plugin while on the youtube page
Step 3: Enjoy your time
Step4: If you want your page back then disable the plugin.(Might need to refresh page)
